effect.shortEffect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.
effect.full: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.

description.diamond-pearl: Raises resistance to Fire-​ and Ice-type moves.
description.platinum: Raises resistance to Fire-​ and Ice-type moves.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Ups resistance to Fire-​ and Ice-type moves.

description.x-y: Boosts resistance to Fire-​ and Ice-type moves.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Boosts resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.
description.sun-moon: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
